price: Mar’yam kaa sε: “Mehwehwε Ahummͻborͻ Hene no hͻ ntwitwagyeε wͻ wo ho, sε woyε Nyamesuroni a.
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālat innī aʿūdhu bil-raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyan
